item.description:
I am a double major student in Computer Engineering and Physics both from Amirkabir University of Technology (Tehran Polytechnic), Iran. I have recently graduated in Physics with GPA of 3.78 /4.00 (17.85 /20 second top student). And I will graduate in Computer Engineering next semester(winter 2019).

My main research interests include Algorithms, Complexity Theory and Graph Theory.

Recently, I am doing a research (click to see more) on graph sampling using different spanning trees and also working on visualization of these graphs in terms of average shortest path, betweenness centrality and …. (click to see more)

My Curriculum Vitae (PDF)

TOEFL iBT score (November 2, 2018): 95 /120 (Reading: 26, Listening 23, Speaking 24, Writing 22)
